ValidationRule.description: ACV Type field on quote can be updated only with users having Intapp Admin Permission Set. Built according to US# 45119, updated to Intapp Operations User as per BIZ-51048
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( $Permission.Operations_User ), OR(
ISCHANGED( ACV_Type__c ),
ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK (TEXT( ACV_Type__c ))) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to override ACV Type , please request Contract/CRM Ops.
